ThingDef.Name: MR_UnfinishedTechArmor
ThingDef.label: unfinished advanced armor
ThingDef.description: An unfinished piece of high-tech armor.
This is a lightweight reinforcement suit that aids hunting in special situations.\n\nIt looks like a patchwork of ununderstood skills, but it's enough to chase prey.
ThingDef.label: Maru Lightweight Reinforcement Suit

ThingDef.description: Weight-enhanced clothing that assists in hunting in special situations.\n\n It looks like a primitive armor with a metal plate underneath a thick coat, but it contains experimental techniques that have not yet been fully interpreted.
ThingDef.label: Maru Heavy Reinforcement Suit

ThingDef.description: This is a mask used by hunter Maru.\n\nProvides the level of defense required for hunting and a sense of intimidation.
ThingDef.label: Maru Hunting Mask

ThingDef.description: This mask is used by Hunter Maru.\n\nIt has been modified to make the body's senses more sensitive and sharp by adjusting the valves on both sides of the barrel.
ThingDef.label: Maru Modified Hunting Mask

ThingDef.description: This is the mask used by Maru of the Mountain Keeper.\n\nIt has been remodeled using ancient technologies whose working principle is unknown.
ThingDef.label: Maru Mountain Ranger's Mask

ThingDef.description: This is the hat worn by Deciphers on the mountain every day.\n\nIt also serves as cold protection, protection, identification, and fashion.
ThingDef.label: Deciphers Life Cap

ThingDef.description: This is a coat worn by Maru on a daily basis.\n\nIt acts like a windbreaker, but it is a bit thicker and more classic.
ThingDef.label: Maru Durumagi

ThingDef.description: This is an Decipherer's insert-type headdress.\n\nThe device inside the headdress assists concentration and provides a certain amount of defense through a force field.
ThingDef.label: Maru Deciphers Headdress

ThingDef.description: This coat is used for work that requires hygiene.\n\nThe white coat makes it easy to detect contamination, and it is possible to separate the inner fabric coated with a solvent and the white side corresponding to the outer surface. Therefore, it is easy to manage and disinfect.
ThingDef.label: Maru Sanitary Coat

ThingDef.description: This is a thick coat to overcome the cold.\n\nIt is a structure made with reference to the fur of an animal that lived on the planet it was born in, and it is very warm and soft.
ThingDef.label: Maru Winter Coat

ThingDef.description: A coat for hunting.\n\nProvides additional defense, and can carry a variety of items that prevent hunting by prey.
ThingDef.label: Maru Hunting Coat

ThingDef.description: This is the coat worn by Deciphers on a mountain top.\n\nThe Decipherer lives indoors near a geyser, which is rare among many floors, so it is thinner and shorter than other coats.
ThingDef.label: Maru Decipherer's Life Coat

ThingDef.description:
This is the Decipherer's robes.

The accelerator built into the clothes lightens the body and sharpens the mind.
The same style has been used since the days of the first Deciphers who were the etymology of Maru, a human living on the mountain. It is being passed down.
ThingDef.label: Maru Decipherer's Robe

ThingDef.description: A garment worn daily by Deciphers on the mountain.\n\nA neat and active garment, crafted in the style of their ancestors unearthed from the ruins.
ThingDef.label: Maru Decipherer's Life Clothes

ThingDef.description:
Cooking clothes for hunting and cooking.

In the society of Maru in the past, only Maru, who possessed both influence and power, was qualified to touch cookware.
Even now, some groups It is a custom that remains only as a tradition of Even so, cooking still has a great meaning for Maru.
ThingDef.label: Maru Cook Outfit

ThingDef.description: It is work clothes for various production activities.\n\nIt is easy to wear, there is no inconvenience in moving, and it is useful for carrying tools.
ThingDef.label: Maru Work Outfit

ThingDef.description: Work clothes for construction and mining.\n\nYou can carry various tools by hanging them on a rope connected to a hook.
ThingDef.label: Maru Engineering Outfit

ThingDef.description: It is work clothes for quick collection and transport.\n\nThe standard outdoor activity clothes of Maru, it has an efficient structure designed not to get tired even if you go a long way.
ThingDef.label: Maru Forager's Outfit

ThingDef.description: It is work clothes used for work where hygiene is important.\n\nIt is made to fit the body slightly inconveniently, but the disinfectant coated on the outer surface of the cloth enables continuous sterilization.
ThingDef.label: Maru Sanitary Clothing

ThingDef.description: This is clothing for hunting.\n\nMost hunters love it, and it functions as camouflage, protection, and cold protection.
ThingDef.label: Maru Hunting Suit

ThingDef.description: This is the hat of wandering merchants who carry goods through ice and snow.\n\nBecause Maru merchants are mainly active in extreme cold areas, they always wear thick hats and clothes to explore the snowy fields.
ThingDef.label: Maru Caravan hat

ThingDef.description: These are the clothes of wandering merchants who carry goods through ice and snow.\n\nBecause Maru merchants are mainly active in extreme cold areas, they always wear thick hats and clothes to explore the snowy fields.
ThingDef.label: Maru Caravan Clothes

ThingDef.description: It is the robe of the musicians for the performance.
ThingDef.label: Maru Musician Outfit

ThingDef.description: It is a hat for the ceremonies of musicians for a performance.
ThingDef.label: Maru Musician hat

ThingDef.description: It is the robe of the musicians for the performance.
ThingDef.label: Maru Musician's Coat

ThingDef.description: A Clown's uniform made for combat.\nThe armor is traditionally constructed with metal plates fastened to the inside of the fabric, and mobility aids allow the wearer to move around without discomfort under heavy weight.
ThingDef.label: Maru Clown Outfit

ThingDef.description: A hat made for the cadre of a itinerant troupe.\nIt is surprisingly protective given its simple appearance and is a symbol of majesty in its own right.
ThingDef.label: Maru Clown hat

ThingDef.description: A clown's helm made for battle.\nIt is traditionally constructed with metal plates fastened to the inside of the fabric and a shield on top, providing both neck and face protection.
ThingDef.label: Maru Clown helmet

ThingDef.description: A clown's uniform made for combat.\nThis armor is traditionally constructed with metal plates fastened to the inside of the fabric.
ThingDef.label: Maru Clown's Coat

ThingDef.description: test
ThingDef.label: Maru successorhat

ThingDef.description: test
ThingDef.label: Maru successorcoat

ThingDef.description: test
ThingDef.label: Maru successorclothes
